title: Elbow Grease Easy Tear Microfibre Cleaning Cloths | Reusable & Machine Washable | Dusts, Cleans, Soaks Up Liquid - Tear & Wipe 30cm x 24cm (Pink, 10 Pack)
features: EASY TEAR DESIGN: Each microfibre cloth tears cleanly from the roll—no scissors needed. Just grab, rip and wipe! Ideal for quick clean-ups in the kitchen or car.
SUPER ABSORBENT CLOTHS: These cloths soak up spills fast, making them perfect for kitchen messes, drinks on the floor, or wiping down the bathroom sink after a splash.
MULTI-USE MICROFIBRE MAGIC: Use as kitchen cloths, dusters or car cleaning cloths. From wiping countertops to polishing car dashboards, they’re the go-to for any task.
TOUGH ON GRIME: These microfibre cloths are strong and durable, helping lift away dirt and stubborn stains from cookers, sinks, and hobs with minimal effort.
REUSABLE AND MACHINE WASHABLE: Pop them in the wash and reuse again and again. Great for reducing waste while keeping the home, car or workspace spotless.
GENTLE ON SURFACES: Designed to be non-scratch, these cleaning cloths are safe on delicate finishes—ideal for cleaning glass, mirrors, or polished furniture.
COMPACT ROLL OF 10: Each pack includes 10 microfibre towels neatly rolled for easy storage. Keep them in a drawer, under the sink or in the boot of the car.
HOUSEHOLD ESSENTIAL: A must-have in any cleaning cupboard. Use for mopping up spills, wiping tiles, or keeping the dining table sparkling between meals.
PERFECT FOR CARS: These cloths double as handy car cleaning towels—ideal for wiping interiors, buffing paintwork, or drying off after a quick wash.
QUICK, CONVENIENT CLEANING: Ideal for busy homes, these cloths are always within reach. Whether it's muddy paws, food splatters or dusty corners—they’ve got it covered.
description: Bring ease and sparkle to every clean-up with these Elbow Grease Easy Tear Microfibre Cleaning Cloths. Designed for busy homes, messy kitchens, and car lovers alike, these cloths offer a grab-and-go solution for everyday cleaning. Whether you're wiping down kitchen counters, polishing your car, or soaking up sudden spills, these ultra-absorbent microfibre cloths are always up to the task. The easy-tear design means you simply rip one from the roll and get to work—no scissors needed! Each cloth is reusable and machine washable, saving money and cutting waste. They're non-scratch, durable, and delightfully strong, tackling dirt, dust and liquids with ease. From soaking up juice on the kitchen floor to dusting skirting boards or detailing your car dashboard, these cleaning cloths are a true household essential.
